text: The Sprint Review The Sprint Retrospective * _ Regular meeting at the end of a sprint * Regular meeting at the end of a sprint (lasts 1-2 hours) (lasts 0.5-2 hours) + Participants: Scrum team and stakeholders + Participants: Only Scrum team + Goal: Present sprint results (ideally in a * Goal: Reflect on the process, identify issues running demo) and get approval from in the process stakeholders + Key question: What went well and went * Key question: Which tasks have been should be improved?
